scan_table_check.description: When performing imports, temporary tables may be created. These names of such tables usually start with "u_imp_templ_". Such tables should be removed before shipping an application.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Temporary tables
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Remove all temporary import tables from applications to be shipped.
scan_table_check.short_description: Temporary import tables should be removed from applications
